Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

user

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder user

Prints information about the currently logged in user, including name, email address, subscription plan and license expiration date.

Related Commands

Command Description
usage-reporting Configures anonymous usage reporting for the AppBuilder CLI.
error-reporting Configures anonymous error reporting for the AppBuilder CLI.
login Opens a new browser window in which you can provide your login credentials for the Progress Telerik Platform.
logout Logs you out from the Progress Telerik Platform.
